title: CoinFi 24 Hour Volume Hits $65,465.00 (COFI)
content: CoinFi (CURRENCY:COFI) traded 0.7% higher against the U.S. dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on June 2nd. One CoinFi token can now be purchased for about $0.0455 or 0.00000597 BTC on cryptocurrency exchanges including Kucoin, Gate.io and IDEX. Over the last seven days, CoinFi has traded down 4% against the U.S. dollar. CoinFi has a total market cap of $7.92 million and $65,465.00 worth of CoinFi was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours.    Here is how similar cryptocurrencies have performed over the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded 4.4% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008417 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 3.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003901 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 1% higher against the dollar and now trades at $1.88 or 0.00024687 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.5% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0609 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $56.55 or 0.00741909 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 0.9% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012998 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 10% higher against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048808 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $14.68 or 0.00192586 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 9.2% against the dollar and now trades at $7.67 or 0.00100615 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001546 BTC.   CoinFi Profile     CoinFi launched on January 26th, 2018. CoinFi’s total supply is 300,000,000 tokens and its circulating supply is 173,973,982 tokens. The official message board for CoinFi is medium.com/coinfi . CoinFi’s official Twitter account is @coin_fi and its Facebook page is accessible here . CoinFi’s official website is www.coinfi.com .  CoinFi Token Trading    CoinFi can be traded on these cryptocurrency exchanges: Kucoin, IDEX and Gate.io. It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as CoinFi directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to trade CoinFi should first buy Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as GDAX, Coinbase or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to buy CoinFi using one of the exchanges listed above.
